name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Airmarks - Track trends, clean duplicates, find broken bookmarks, and more.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring order to your bookmarks. Track trends, find duplicates, find broken links, and stay effortlessly organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Airmarks - Clean, Organize and gain bookmark insights effortlessly.

🌟 Features:

✨ Airy, Intuitive Design: A clean, modern UI that makes organizing bookmarks a breeze.
📊 Track your bookmark trends with a dynamic graph and gain insights into your bookmarking 
trends, top domains, and folders all in a clean and intuitive design.
✂️ Automatically detect and clean duplicates and empty folders.
🔗 Scan for broken links and ensure all your bookmarks are functional.

🚨 Get the Best Out of Airmarks 
We recommend backing up your bookmarks before making significant changes, as deleted bookmarks cannot be restored. You can easily create a backup using Chrome’s built-in bookmark manager. Learn how : https://it.nmu.edu/docs/backing-bookmarksfavorites

💌 Support Airmarks.
Love using Airmarks? Help us continue improving the extension by spreading the word or providing feedback.
